attributes.action: Provide FREE DENTAL CARE FOR THE OVER 70'S
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As an OAP I find it impossible to pay for my dental care, and it is the OAPs,who are most vulnerable and have greatest need of FREE dental care. My occupational pension(s) have not kept pace with inflation, in fact I have not had any increase, since I retired 10 years ago. I SUBMIT THAT ALL OAPs OVER 70 YEARS SHOULD BE GIVEN FREE DENTAL TREATMENT.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
